name: As Wild As Life Pre-Alpha
description:
As Wild As Life Pre-Alpha Access.

NOTE: To play the game, a FREE Pre-Alpha Key is needed!

Please join my Discord: https://discord.gg/WcqQYbCVPJ

& Create a Ticket to Request a FREE key.

How to Start playing?:

Download the .rar file, unpack it and put the launcher in the location where you want the Game to download, then start the launcher!
